definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Please lay the maxim to your heart.
Aphorisms are essentially an aristocratic genre of writing.
sentences.chinese: 格言本质上是天才般的写作。

sentences.english: Serving the people is my motto.
sentences.chinese: 为人民服务是我的格言。

sentences.english: All of these sayings reflect the American obsession with properness and efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些格言都反映了美国人对正派和效率的痴迷。

sentences.english: Eventually, perhaps soon, the market must obey Mr Micawber’s dictum.
sentences.chinese: 最终，也许很快，市场肯定会兑现米考伯的格言。

sentences.english: They occupy a special place in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 治家格言在中国文化中有特殊的位置。

sentences.english: Liu said one of her favorite English mottos is "No one can achieve anything without effort".
sentences.chinese: 刘表示她最喜欢的英语格言是“没有人能不劳而获。”

sentences.english: So rush off and find some good quotes to discuss with your child.
sentences.chinese: 所以赶快行动起来，去找些好的格言来与孩子讨论吧。

sentences.english: Mottoes are blurted out from the wisdom of philosphers.
sentences.chinese: 格言是由哲学家的机智中迸发而出的。

sentences.english: A great man's foolish saying pass for wise ones.
sentences.chinese: 大人物的傻话常被当作明智的格言。

sentences.english: Chinese adage goes, "The world will be in peace as long as there are grains and pork.
sentences.chinese: 中国的格言讲，“只要有粮有猪肉，世界就会和平”。

sentences.english: Another home-grown proverb is Every dog is allowed one bite.
sentences.chinese: 另一句土生土长的格言是，“每条狗允许咬一次人”。

sentences.english: What mottos do you live by?
A: What does this proverb mean?
And their philosophy is " I know I how to earn money when I know how to spend money".
sentences.chinese: 他们的格言是“能花才更能赚”，花光用光自得其乐。

definition: quotation (from a book or existing source)
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2
